body: Poet Nation is a multimedia brand dedicated to Somali art and culture that combines a mix of original and user generated content. The Poet Nation features poets, musicians, writers, storytellers and other artists.
original_body: Poet Nation is a multimedia brand dedicated to Somali art and culture that combines a mix of original and user generated content. The Poet Nation features poets, musicians, writers, storytellers and other artists.
title: Somalia: Welcome to Poet Nation

sentence: Poet Nation is a multimedia brand dedicated to Somali art and culture that combines a mix of original and user generated content.
The Poet Nation features poets, musicians, writers, storytellers and other artists.
